Class: EPSSaveOptions

EPSSaveOptions

new EPSSaveOptions()

Options for saving a document as an Illustrator EPS file, used with the saveAs method. All properties are optional.
Source:
  • EPSSaveOptions.js, line 5

Members

(inner) artboardRange :string

If saveMultipleArtboards is true, this is considered for multi-asset extraction, which specifies the artboard range. An empty string extracts all the artboards. Default: empty string
Type:
  • string
Source:
  • EPSSaveOptions.js, line 10

(inner) cmykPostScript :boolean

If true, use CMYK PostScript.
Type:
  • boolean
Source:
  • EPSSaveOptions.js, line 16

(inner) compatibility :Compatibility

Specifies the version of the EPS file format to save. Default: Compatibility.ILLUSTRATOR1719
Type:
  • Compatibility
Source:
  • EPSSaveOptions.js, line 22

(inner) compatibleGradientPrinting :boolean

If true, create a raster item of the gradient or gradient mesh so that PostScript Level 2 printers can print the object. Default: false
Type:
  • boolean
Source:
  • EPSSaveOptions.js, line 28

(inner) embedAllFonts :boolean

If true, all fonts used by the document should be embedded in the saved file (version 7 or later). Default: false
Type:
  • boolean
Source:
  • EPSSaveOptions.js, line 34

(inner) embedLinkedFiles :boolean

If true, linked image files are to be included in the saved document.
Type:
  • boolean
Source:
  • EPSSaveOptions.js, line 40

(inner) flattenOuput :OutputFlattening

How should transparency be flattened for file formats older than Illustrator 9.
Type:
  • OutputFlattening
Source:
  • EPSSaveOptions.js, line 46

(inner) includeDocumentThumbnails :boolean

If true, thumbnail image of the EPS artwork should be included.
Type:
  • boolean
Source:
  • EPSSaveOptions.js, line 52

(inner) overprint :PDFOverprint

Whether to preserve, discard, or simulate the overprint. Default: PDFOverprint.PRESERVEPDFOVERPRINT
Type:
  • PDFOverprint
Source:
  • EPSSaveOptions.js, line 58

(inner) postScript :EPSPostScriptLevelEnum

PostScript Language Level to use (Level 1 valid for file format version 8 or older). Default: EPSPostScriptLevelEnum.LEVEL2
Type:
  • EPSPostScriptLevelEnum
Source:
  • EPSSaveOptions.js, line 65

(inner) preview :EPSPreview

The format for the EPS preview image.
Type:
  • EPSPreview
Source:
  • EPSSaveOptions.js, line 71

(inner) saveMultipleArtboards :boolean

If true, all artboards or range of artboards are saved. Default: false
Type:
  • boolean
Source:
  • EPSSaveOptions.js, line 77

(inner) typename :string

Read-only. The class name of the referenced object.
Type:
  • string
Source:
  • EPSSaveOptions.js, line 83
